CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(QuoteId__r.ShippingStreet), '', QuoteId__r.ShippingStreet + ', ')+ IF(ISBLANK(QuoteId__r.ShippingCity), '', QuoteId__r.ShippingCity + ', ')+ IF(ISBLANK(QuoteId__r.ShippingPostalCode), '', QuoteId__r.ShippingPostalCode + ', ')+ IF(ISBLANK(QuoteId__r.ShippingCountry), '', QuoteId__r.ShippingCountry)
CustomField.label: Shipping Address
